verses.verse: Now the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H1961>reached<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> at the <S%H7097>extreme<s%> <S%H8486>south.<s%>

And their <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was from the lower <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> that <S%H6437>turns<s%> to the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

Then it <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> to the <S%H4610>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim<s%> and <S%H5674>continued<s%> to <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> then <S%H5927>went<s%> up by the <S%H5045>south<s%> of Kadesh-barnea and <S%H5674>continued<s%> to <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H146>Addar<s%> and <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> to <S%H7173>Karka.<s%>

And it <S%H5674>continued<s%> to <S%H6111>Azmon<s%> and <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> shall be your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

And the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> [was] the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H7097>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> was from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the <S%H7097>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

Then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to Beth-hoglah, and <S%H5674>continued<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of Beth-arabah, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H1688>Debir<s%> from the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor,<s%> and <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5227>opposite<s%> the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>continued<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of En-shemesh, and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at En-rogel.

Then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Ben-hinnom<s%> to the <S%H3802>slope<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> (that is, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>); and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Hinnom to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

And from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H9638>curved<s%> to the <S%H4599>spring<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah<s%> and <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron,<s%> then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H9638>curved<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> (that is, Kiriath-jearim).

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> from <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and <S%H5674>continued<s%> to the <S%H3802>slope<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H3297>Jearim<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> (that is, <S%H3693>Chesalon<s%>), and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to Beth-shemesh and <S%H5674>continued<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H8553>Timnah.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward.<s%> Then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H9638>curved<s%> to <S%H7942>Shikkeron<s%> and <S%H5674>continued<s%> to <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> and <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> to <S%H2995>Jabneel,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> [was] at the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> even [its] <S%H1366>coastline.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Now he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> [namely,] Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of <S%H1>Anak<s%> (that is, <S%H6061>Hebron<s%>).

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> out from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak:<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%> and <S%H8526>Talmai,<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak.<s%>

Then he <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir;<s%> now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>formerly<s%> was Kiriath-sepher.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The one <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>attacks<s%> Kiriath-sepher and <S%H3920>captures<s%> it, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>"

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb,<s%> <S%H3920>captured<s%> it; so he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as a <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that when she <S%H935>came<s%> [to him,] she <S%H5496>persuaded<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> her father for a <S%H1>field.<s%> So she <S%H7704>alighted<s%> from the <S%H6795>donkey,<s%> and <S%H2543>Caleb<s%> <S%H3612>said<s%> to her, <S%H559>"What<s%> do you want?"

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>Negev,<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>" So he <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>lower<s%> <S%H1543>springs.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

Now the <S%H5892>cities<s%> at the <S%H7097>extremity<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> were <S%H6909>Kabzeel<s%> and <S%H9387>Eder<s%> and <S%H3017>Jagur,<s%>
and <S%H3822>Lebaoth<s%> and <S%H7978>Shilhim<s%> and <S%H5871>Ain<s%> and <S%H9558>Rimmon;<s%> in <S%H3605>all,<s%> twenty-nine <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
and <S%H8189>Shaaraim<s%> and <S%H5723>Adithaim<s%> and <S%H1449>Gederah<s%> and <S%H1453>Gederothaim;<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
and <S%H1450>Gederoth,<s%> Beth-dagon and <S%H9337>Naamah<s%> and <S%H4719>Makkedah;<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
from <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that were by the <S%H3027>side<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H9161>villages;<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and its <S%H9161>villages;<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> even [its] <S%H1366>coastline.<s%>
and <S%H2547>Humtah<s%> and Kiriath-arba (that is, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), and <S%H6730>Zior;<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
and <S%H4638>Maarath<s%> and Beth-anoth and <S%H515>Eltekon;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), and <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
and <S%H5044>Nibshan<s%> and the <S%H5898>City<s%> of <S%H5898>Salt<s%> and <S%H5872>Engedi;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

Now as for the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out; so the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
